column4: hey..where can I get help on getting tv-out to work? I use Debian 4.0 and I have a xfx Geforce 6800GS card..
i've tried there, but noone answers..and since it's probably the same for ubuntu i thought i'd ask here
there are some instructions on wiki.ubuntu.com (search for nvidia tvout), it's easy to just use "nvidia-settings" too
